entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
